name: UIPress
desc: An object that represents the presence or movement of a button press on the screen for a particular event.

items.name: var force: CGFloat
items.desc: The force of the button press.

items.name: var gestureRecognizers: [UIGestureRecognizer]?
items.desc: The gesture recognizers that are receiving the press.

items.name: var window: UIWindow?
items.desc: The window in which the press initially occurred.

items.name: var key: UIKey?
items.desc: The key pressed or released on a physical keyboard.

items.name: var type: UIPress.PressType
items.desc: The type of the specified press.

items.name: var phase: UIPress.Phase
items.desc: The current press phase of the object.

items.name: var timestamp: TimeInterval
items.desc: The time when the press occurred or when it was last mutated.

items.name: enum UIPress.Phase
items.desc: The phases of a button press.

items.name: enum UIPress.PressType
items.desc: Constants that represent buttons that a user can press.
